title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: Your privacy is our absolute priority. Discover our commitment to protecting your personal data.

commitment.title: Your privacy, our commitment
commitment.description: At GoldWen, we are committed to protecting your personal data and respecting your privacy. Our practices follow the highest industry standards and comply with GDPR.

minimal_data.title: Minimal data
minimal_data.description: We only collect data strictly necessary for the application's functionality.

encryption.title: Complete encryption
encryption.description: All your data is encrypted in transit and at rest with the latest technologies.

no_selling.title: No data selling
no_selling.description: Your personal information is never sold or shared with third parties.

user_control.title: User control
user_control.description: You maintain total control over your data and can delete it at any time.

transparency.title: Total transparency
transparency.description: We clearly explain how we use your data, without technical jargon.

gdpr_compliance.title: GDPR compliance
gdpr_compliance.description: Strict compliance with the European General Data Protection Regulation.

authentication.title: Secure authentication
authentication.description: Secure login with optional two-factor authentication.

secure_servers.title: Secure servers
secure_servers.description: Infrastructure hosted in ISO 27001 certified data centers.

regular_audits.title: Regular audits
regular_audits.description: Regular security audits by independent experts.

coming_soon.title: Complete policy available soon
coming_soon.description: The detailed privacy policy will be published with the application launch. It will precisely detail our data protection practices.
